page.title: 15CRAFTS-LILLESHALL,CH.ASTON
page.content: In{Lilleshall village}there are 2 {businesses.}One is{Miss Mouse,}a dressmaker employing 12 people.It was established in 1974 and sells all over the world.The other is{Squirrel Yarns which was established in 1979.It is run by a family with own transport employing 120 part-time workers , selling locally and elsewhere.There are{classes}in corn dollies,wood turning and lace-making.The{W.I.}have {demonstrations}e.g.wine making,corn dollies,flower arranging.They have {competitions}in the Church and Church Hall. In{Church Aston}there are lace making {classes}held in the Village Hall.There is a leather worker,a spinner and an artist in the village.Again the{W.I.} has{competitions}and{demonstrations.}
